road_gravel_twoWay_twoLane_desc.english:
A simple two-way, two-lane road.
Buildings can connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).
road_gravel_twoWay_twoLane_desc.italian:
Una semplice strada a due corsie, con doppio senso di circolazione.
Gli edifici possono collegarsi ad essa. Usa i tasti di scelta rapida per regolare l'altezza (R e F di default).
road_gravel_twoWay_twoLane_desc.thai:
เดินรถสองเลนที่เรียบง่าย ถนนสองเลน
อาคารสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับถนนได้ ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_gravel_oneWay_oneLane_desc.english:
A simple one-way, one-lane road.
Buildings can connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).
road_gravel_oneWay_oneLane_desc.italian:
Una semplice strada a una corsia, a senso unico.
Gli edifici possono collegarsi ad essa. Usa i tasti di scelta rapida per regolare l'altezza (R e F di default).
road_gravel_oneWay_oneLane_desc.thai:
เดินรถทางเดียวที่เรียบง่าย ถนนสองเลน
อาคารสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับถนนได้ ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

อาคารสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับถนนได้ ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

อาคารสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับถนนได้ ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_concrete_twoWay_sixLane_desc.italian:

road_concrete_twoWay_sixLane_desc.thai: เดินรถสองทาง ถนนหกเลน

อาคารสามารถเชื่อมต่อกับถนนได้ ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

Una strada a due corsie, a senso unico .

A one-way, three-lane road.
Buildings can connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).
road_concrete_oneWay_threeLane_desc.italian:
Una strada a tree corsie, a senso unico.
Gli edifici possono collegarsi ad essa. Usa i tasti di scelta rapida per regolare l'altezza (R e F di default).
road_concrete_oneWay_threeLane_desc.thai:

road_highway_twoWay_twoLane_desc.english:
A two-way, two-lane highway.
Buildings do not connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).
road_highway_twoWay_twoLane_desc.italian:
Un'autostrada a due corsie, con doppio senso di circolazione.
Gli edifici non possono collegarsi ad essa. Usa i tasti di scelta rapida per regolare l'altezza (R e F di default).
road_highway_twoWay_twoLane_desc.thai:
เดินรถสองทาง ทางหลวงสองเลน
อาคารไม่ได้เชื่อมต่อกับทางหลวง ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_highway_twoWay_fourLane_desc.thai:

อาคารไม่ได้เชื่อมต่อกับทางหลวง ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_superhighway_oneWay_oneLane_desc.english:
A one-way, one-lane superhighway.
Buildings do not connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).

อาคารไม่ได้เชื่อมต่อกับทางหลวงดังกล่าว ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_superhighway_oneWay_twoLane_desc.english:

Buildings do not connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).

Una super-autostrada a due corsie, a senso unico.
Gli edifici non possono collegarsi ad essa. Usa i tasti di scelta rapida per regolare l'altezza (R e F di default).

เดินรถทางเดียว ทางหลวงพิเศษสองเลน
อาคารไม่ได้เชื่อมต่อถึงกัน ใช้ปุ่มลัดเพื่อปรับความสูง (R และ F ตามค่าเริ่มต้น)

road_superhighway_oneWay_threeLane_desc.english:
A one-way, three-lane superhighway.
Buildings do not connect to it. Use hotkeys to adjust the height (R and F by default).
road_superhighway_oneWay_threeLane_desc.italian:
Una super-autostrada a tre corsie, a senso unico.

เดินรถทางเดียว ทางหลวงพิเศษสามเลน

rail_oneWay_desc.english:
Low-speed train tracks. One-way.
Rails are allowed to overlap, but pay attention to intersections! Click on the traffic light icon above to supervise them.
rail_oneWay_desc.italian:
Binari per treni a bassa velocità, a senso unico.
I binari possono sovrapporsi, ma presta attenzione agli incroci! Clicca sull'icona del semaforo qui sopra per supervisionarli.
rail_oneWay_desc.thai:
รางรถไฟความเร็วต่ำ. เที่ยวเดียว
รางได้รับอนุญาตให้ทับซ้อนกันได้ แต่ต้องระวังทางแยกด้วย! คลิกที่ไอคอนสัญญาณไฟจราจรด้านบนเพื่อควบคุมดูแล

rail_oneWay_highspeed_desc.english:
Medium-speed train tracks. One-way.
Rails are allowed to overlap, but pay attention to intersections! Click on the traffic light icon above to supervise them.
rail_oneWay_highspeed_desc.italian:
Binari per treni a media velocità, a senso unico.
I binari possono sovrapporsi, ma presta attenzione agli incroci! Clicca sull'icona del semaforo qui sopra per supervisionarli.
rail_oneWay_highspeed_desc.thai:
รางรถไฟความเร็วปานกลาง เที่ยวเดียว
รางได้รับอนุญาตให้ทับซ้อนกันได้ แต่ต้องระวังทางแยกด้วย! คลิกที่ไอคอนสัญญาณไฟจราจรด้านบนเพื่อควบคุมดูแล

rail_oneWay_superhighspeed_desc.english:
High-speed train tracks. One-way.
Rails are allowed to overlap, but pay attention to intersections! Click on the traffic light icon above to supervise them.
rail_oneWay_superhighspeed_desc.italian:
Binari per treni ad alta velocità, a senso unico.
I binari possono sovrapporsi, ma presta attenzione agli incroci! Clicca sull'icona del semaforo qui sopra per supervisionarli.
rail_oneWay_superhighspeed_desc.thai:
รางรถไฟความเร็วสูง. เที่ยวเดียว
รางได้รับอนุญาตให้ทับซ้อนกันได้ แต่ต้องระวังทางแยกด้วย! คลิกที่ไอคอนสัญญาณไฟจราจรด้านบนเพื่อควบคุมดูแล

pipe_oxygen_desc.english:
These pipes can connect buildings that produce oxygen with all those that need it, including tanks and habitats.
Buildings that produce the resource transported by pipelines consume twice as much electricity!
pipe_oxygen_desc.italian:
Questi tubi possono collegare gli edifici che producono ossigeno con tutti quelli che ne hanno bisogno, compresi i serbatoi e gli habitat.
Gli edifici che producono la risorsa trasportata dai tubi consumano il doppio dell'elettricità!
pipe_oxygen_desc.thai:
ท่อเหล่านี้สามารถเชื่อมต่ออาคารที่ผลิตออกซิเจนกับทุกสิ่งที่ต้องการ รวมถึงถังเก็บน้ำและที่อยู่อาศัย
อาคารที่ผลิตทรัพยากรที่ขนส่งโดยท่อส่งจะใช้พลังงานไฟฟ้าเป็นสองเท่า!

pipe_water_desc.english:
These pipes can connect buildings that produce water with all those that need it, including tanks and habitats.
Buildings that produce the resource transported by pipelines consume twice as much electricity!
pipe_water_desc.italian:
Questi tubi possono collegare gli edifici che producono acqua con tutti quelli che ne hanno bisogno, compresi i serbatoi e gli habitat.
Gli edifici che producono la risorsa trasportata dai tubi consumano il doppio dell'elettricità!
pipe_water_desc.thai:
ท่อเหล่านี้สามารถเชื่อมต่ออาคารที่ผลิตน้ำเข้ากับสิ่งจำเป็นทั้งหมด รวมถึงถังเก็บน้ำและแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัย
อาคารที่ผลิตทรัพยากรที่ขนส่งโดยท่อส่งน้ำจะใช้พลังงานไฟฟ้าเป็นสองเท่า!

pipe_crudeOil_desc.english:
These pipes can connect buildings that produce crude oil with all those that need it, including tanks and habitats.
Buildings that produce the resource transported by pipelines consume twice as much electricity!
pipe_crudeOil_desc.italian:
Questi tubi possono collegare gli edifici che producono petrolio con tutti quelli che ne hanno bisogno, compresi i serbatoi e gli habitat.
Gli edifici che producono la risorsa trasportata dai tubi consumano il doppio dell'elettricità!
pipe_crudeOil_desc.thai:
ท่อเหล่านี้สามารถเชื่อมต่ออาคารที่ผลิตน้ำมันดิบกับสิ่งจำเป็นทั้งหมด รวมถึงถังเก็บน้ำมันและแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัย
อาคารที่ผลิตทรัพยากรที่ขนส่งโดยท่อส่งใช้ไฟฟ้าเป็นสองเท่า!

pipe_methane_desc.english:
These pipes can connect buildings that produce methane with all those that need it, including tanks and habitats.
Buildings that produce the resource transported by pipelines consume twice as much electricity!
pipe_methane_desc.italian:
Questi tubi possono collegare gli edifici che producono metano con tutti quelli che ne hanno bisogno, compresi i serbatoi e gli habitat.
Gli edifici che producono la risorsa trasportata dai tubi consumano il doppio dell'elettricità!
pipe_methane_desc.thai:
ท่อเหล่านี้สามารถเชื่อมต่ออาคารที่ผลิตก๊าซมีเทนกับสิ่งอื่นๆ ที่จำเป็น รวมถึงถังเก็บน้ำและที่อยู่อาศัย
อาคารที่ผลิตทรัพยากรที่ขนส่งโดยท่อส่งจะใช้พลังงานไฟฟ้าเป็นสองเท่า!

monumentDrill_Stage0_desc.english: This colossal drill will need several resources for its construction to be completed. It can be placed anywhere.
monumentDrill_Stage0_desc.italian: Questa trivella colossale necessita di diverse risorse per la sua costruzione. Può essere posizionata ovunque.
monumentDrill_Stage0_desc.thai: สว่านขนาดมหึมานี้จะต้องใช้ทรัพยากรหลายอย่างเพื่อให้การก่อสร้างเสร็จสมบูรณ์ สามารถวางได้ทุกที่

sandMine_desc.english: This mine can be placed anywhere.
sandMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera può essere posizionata ovunque.
sandMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้สามารถวางได้ทุกที่

sulfurMine_desc.english: This mine is required to be placed on a sulfur deposit.
sulfurMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di zolfo.
sulfurMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จำเป็นต้องวางบนแหล่งสะสมกำมะถัน

ironMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on an iron deposit.
ironMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di ferro.
ironMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมเหล็ก

copperMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a copper deposit.
copperMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di rame.
copperMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมทองแดง

aluminiumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on an aluminum deposit.
aluminiumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di alluminio.
aluminiumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนชั้นอะลูมิเนียม

uraniumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a uranium deposit.
uraniumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di uranio.
uraniumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมยูเรเนียม

iridiumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a iridium deposit.
iridiumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di iridio.
iridiumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมอิริเดียม

methaneDrill_desc.english:
Extracts methane from underground.
This building is to be placed on a methane deposit.
methaneDrill_desc.italian:
Estrae metano dal sottosuolo.
Questo edificio deve essere collocato su un deposito di metano.
methaneDrill_desc.thai:
สกัดมีเทนจากใต้ดิน
อาคารนี้จะถูกนำไปวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมมีเทน

crudeOilExtractor_desc.english:
Extracts crude oil from underground.
This building is to be placed on dark, spiked ground, which conceals an oil deposit.
crudeOilExtractor_desc.italian:
Estrae petrolio dal sottosuolo.
Questo edificio deve essere collocato su un terreno scuro e spinoso, che cela un deposito di petrolio.
crudeOilExtractor_desc.thai:
สกัดน้ำมันดิบจากใต้ดิน
อาคารนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนพื้นมืดและมีหนามแหลมซึ่งปกปิดคราบน้ำมัน

largeCrudeOilExtractor_desc.english:
Extracts crude oil from underground.
This building is to be placed on dark, spiked ground, which conceals an oil deposit.
largeCrudeOilExtractor_desc.italian:
Estrae petrolio dal sottosuolo.
Questo edificio deve essere collocato su un terreno scuro e spinoso, che cela un deposito di petrolio.
largeCrudeOilExtractor_desc.thai:
สกัดน้ำมันดิบจากใต้ดิน
อาคารนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนพื้นมืดและมีหนามแหลมซึ่งปกปิดคราบน้ำมัน

largeSandMine_desc.english: This mine can be placed anywhere.
largeSandMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera può essere posizionata ovunque.
largeSandMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้สามารถวางได้ทุกที่

largeSulfurMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a sulfur deposit.
largeSulfurMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di iridio.
largeSulfurMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งกำมะถัน

largeIronMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a iron deposit.
largeIronMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di ferro.
largeIronMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมเหล็ก

largeCopperMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a copper deposit.
largeCopperMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di rame.
largeCopperMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมทองแดง

largeAluminiumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a alluminium deposit.
largeAluminiumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di alluminio.
largeAluminiumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะต้องวางอยู่บนชั้นอะลูมิเนียม

largeUraniumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a uranium deposit.
largeUraniumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di uranio.
largeUraniumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมยูเรเนียม

largeIridiumMine_desc.english: This mine is to be placed on a iridium deposit.
largeIridiumMine_desc.italian: Questa miniera deve essere collocata su un deposito di iridio.
largeIridiumMine_desc.thai: เหมืองนี้จะถูกวางไว้บนแหล่งสะสมอิริเดียม

electronicsFactory_desc.english: Produces all kinds of basic electronic components.
electronicsFactory_desc.italian: Produce ogni genere di componente elettronico.
electronicsFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตชิ้นส่วนอิเล็กทรอนิกส์พื้นฐานทุกชนิด

microchipFactory_desc.english: Produces microchips, essential for the production of many electronic items.
microchipFactory_desc.italian: Produce microchips, essenziali per la produzione di molti oggetti elettronici.
microchipFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตไมโครชิป ซึ่งจำเป็นสำหรับการผลิตสินค้าอิเล็กทรอนิกส์หลายชนิด

neuralProcessorFactory_desc.english: Produces specialized processors, designed for neural network applications.
neuralProcessorFactory_desc.italian: Produce processori progettati per applicazioni di reti neurali
neuralProcessorFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตโปรเซสเซอร์พิเศษที่ออกแบบมาสำหรับแอปพลิเคชันโครงข่ายประสาทเทียม

motorFactory_desc.english: Produces motors for every industrial need.
motorFactory_desc.italian: Produce motori per ogni esigenza industriale.
motorFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตมอเตอร์สำหรับทุกความต้องการของอุตสาหกรรม

nanotubesFactory_desc.english: Produces carbon nanotubes, used in highly specialized industries.
nanotubesFactory_desc.italian: Produce nanotubi di carbonio, utilizzati in industrie altamente specializzate.
nanotubesFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตท่อนาโนคาร์บอนที่ใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมเฉพาะทางสูง

reinforcedIridiumFactory_desc.english: Produces reinforced iridium ingots, whose properties make it suitable for the production of high-tech products.
reinforcedIridiumFactory_desc.italian: Produce lingotti di iridio rinforzato, le cui proprietà lo rendono adatto alla produzione di prodotti high-tech.
reinforcedIridiumFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตแท่งอิริเดียมเสริมแรงซึ่งมีคุณสมบัติทำให้เหมาะสำหรับการผลิตผลิตภัณฑ์ที่มีเทคโนโลยีสูง

holoDisplayFactory_desc.english: Produces devices capable of projecting holograms.
holoDisplayFactory_desc.italian: Produce dispositivi in grado di proiettare ologrammi.
holoDisplayFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตอุปกรณ์ที่สามารถฉายภาพโฮโลแกรมได้

radiationCoreFactory_desc.english: Produces radiation cores, a valuable component used in high-tech industries.
radiationCoreFactory_desc.italian: Produce nuclei di radiazione, un componente prezioso utilizzato nelle industrie high-tech.
radiationCoreFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตแกนรังสีซึ่งเป็นส่วนประกอบอันมีค่าที่ใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมเทคโนโลยีขั้นสูง

concreteFactory_desc.english: Produces cement, the main resource for construction.
concreteFactory_desc.italian: Produce cemento, la principale risorsa per costruire.
concreteFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตปูนซีเมนต์ซึ่งเป็นทรัพยากรหลักในการก่อสร้าง

steelMill_desc.english: Produces steel, an essential resource for construction.
steelMill_desc.italian: Produce acciaio, una risorsa essenziale per costruire.
steelMill_desc.thai: ผลิตเหล็กซึ่งเป็นทรัพยากรที่จำเป็นสำหรับการก่อสร้าง

homeAppliancesFactory_desc.english:
Home appliances are a necessary convenience. After all, we are in the future!

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 3.
homeAppliancesFactory_desc.italian:
Gli elettrodomestici sono una comodità necessaria. Dopo tutto, siamo nel futuro!

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 3.
homeAppliancesFactory_desc.thai:
เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้าภายในบ้านถือเป็นสิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกที่จำเป็น ท้ายที่สุดแล้ว เราอยู่ในอนาคต!

ทรัพยากรที่จำเป็นในการปรับปรุงแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัยในระดับ 3

computerFactory_desc.english:
Who doesn't love to relax while playing their favorite video game?

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 4.
computerFactory_desc.italian:
Chi non ama rilassarsi giocando al proprio videogioco preferito?

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 4.
computerFactory_desc.thai:
ใครบ้างจะไม่ชอบพักผ่อนขณะเล่นวิดีโอเกมโปรด

ทรัพยากรที่จำเป็นในการปรับปรุงแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัยในระดับ 4

homeRobotFactory_desc.english:
There is nothing better than finding breakfast ready. Thank you, domestic robot!

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 5.
homeRobotFactory_desc.italian:
Non c'è niente di meglio che trovare la colazione pronta. Grazie, robot domestico!

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 5.
homeRobotFactory_desc.thai: ไม่มีอะไรจะดีไปกว่าการหาอาหารเช้าให้พร้อม ขอบคุณ หุ่นยนต์ประจำบ้าน!\in\ทรัพยากรที่จำเป็นในการปรับปรุงแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัยที่ระดับ 5

industrialRobotFactory_desc.english:
Advanced robotic arms, suitable for any job: from the most tedious, to the most dangerous. Reduce workers by 1.
A single resource is delivered to industries in order of proximity, and will be used until it is consumed. If you want to target them to specific industries, use districts or distribution centers!
industrialRobotFactory_desc.italian:
Braccia robotiche avanzate, adatte a qualsiasi lavoro: dal più noioso, al più pericoloso. Riducono i lavoratori di 1.
Una singola risorsa viene consegnata alle industrie in ordine di prossimità, e verrà utilizzata fino al suo consumo. Se vuoi indirizzarli a industrie specifiche, utilizzate i distretti o i centri di distribuzione!
industrialRobotFactory_desc.thai:
แขนหุ่นยนต์ขั้นสูง เหมาะสำหรับทุกงาน ตั้งแต่งานที่น่าเบื่อที่สุด ไปจนถึงงานที่อันตรายที่สุด ลดคนงานลง 1
ทรัพยากรเดียวจะถูกส่งไปยังอุตสาหกรรมตามลำดับความใกล้เคียง และจะถูกใช้จนกว่าจะถูกใช้ไป หากคุณต้องการกำหนดเป้าหมายไปยังอุตสาหกรรมเฉพาะ ให้ใช้เขตหรือศูนย์กระจายสินค้า!

highTechWorkshop_desc.english:
This incredibly advanced instrumentation will take your industries to a new level. Increase production speed by 50%.
A single resource is delivered to industries in order of proximity, and will be used until it is consumed. If you want to target them to specific industries, use districts or distribution centers!
highTechWorkshop_desc.italian:
Questa strumentazione incredibilmente avanzata porterà le tue industrie a un nuovo livello. Aumenta la velocità di produzione del 50%.
Una singola risorsa viene consegnata alle industrie in ordine di prossimità, e verrà utilizzata fino al suo consumo. Se vuoi indirizzarli a industrie specifiche, utilizzate i distretti o i centri di distribuzione!
highTechWorkshop_desc.thai:
เครื่องมือที่ล้ำสมัยอย่างเหลือเชื่อนี้จะนำพาอุตสาหกรรมของคุณไปสู่อีกระดับหนึ่ง เพิ่มความเร็วในการผลิต 50%
ทรัพยากรเดียวจะถูกส่งไปยังอุตสาหกรรมตามลำดับความใกล้เคียง และจะถูกใช้จนกว่าจะถูกใช้ไป หากคุณต้องการกำหนดเป้าหมายไปยังอุตสาหกรรมเฉพาะ ให้ใช้เขตหรือศูนย์กระจายสินค้า!

vrEdutainmentFactory_desc.english:
Expand your horizons through augmented reality!

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 6.
vrEdutainmentFactory_desc.italian:
Espandi i tuoi orizzonti con la realtà aumentata!

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 6.
vrEdutainmentFactory_desc.thai:
ขยายขอบเขตอันไกลโพ้นของคุณผ่านความเป็นจริงเสริม!

ทรัพยากรที่จำเป็นในการปรับปรุงแหล่งที่อยู่อาศัยที่ระดับ 6

superconductorFactory_desc.english: It produces a highly conductive material.
superconductorFactory_desc.thai: มันผลิตวัสดุที่เป็นสื่อกระแสไฟฟ้าสูง

aiControlUnitFactory_desc.english: Produces a special kind of processor, specialized for AI applications. Needed only for high-tech computing tasks.
aiControlUnitFactory_desc.italian: Produce un particolare processore, specializzato per le applicazioni di intelligenza artificiale. Necessario solo per compiti di calcolo ad alta tecnologia.
aiControlUnitFactory_desc.thai: ผลิตโปรเซสเซอร์ชนิดพิเศษเฉพาะสำหรับแอปพลิเคชัน AI จำเป็นสำหรับงานคอมพิวเตอร์ที่มีเทคโนโลยีสูงเท่านั้น

sciencePack1Factory_desc.english: This factory produces tools and reagents needed for basic scientific research, and delivers them in a convenient package.
sciencePack1Factory_desc.italian: Questa fabbrica produce strumenti e reagenti necessari per la ricerca scientifica di base e li consegna in un pratico pacchetto.
sciencePack1Factory_desc.thai: โรงงานแห่งนี้ผลิตเครื่องมือและสารที่ใช้เป็นตัวกระทำปฏิกิริยาที่จำเป็นสำหรับการวิจัยทางวิทยาศาสตร์ขั้นพื้นฐาน และจัดส่งในบรรจุภัณฑ์ที่สะดวก

sciencePack2Factory_desc.english: This factory produces tools and reagents needed for fundamental scientific research, and delivers them in a convenient package.
sciencePack2Factory_desc.italian: Questa fabbrica produce strumenti e reagenti necessari per la ricerca scientifica fondamentale e li consegna in un pratico pacchetto.
sciencePack2Factory_desc.thai: โรงงานแห่งนี้ผลิตเครื่องมือและสารที่ใช้เป็นตัวกระทำปฏิกิริยาที่จำเป็นสำหรับการวิจัยทางวิทยาศาสตร์ขั้นพื้นฐาน และจัดส่งในบรรจุภัณฑ์ที่สะดวก

sciencePack3Factory_desc.english: This factory produces tools and reagents needed for advanced scientific research, and delivers them in a convenient package.
sciencePack3Factory_desc.italian: Questa fabbrica produce strumenti e reagenti necessari per la ricerca scientifica avanzata e li consegna in un pratico pacchetto.
sciencePack3Factory_desc.thai: โรงงานแห่งนี้ผลิตเครื่องมือและสารที่ใช้เป็นตัวกระทำปฏิกิริยาที่จำเป็นสำหรับการวิจัยทางวิทยาศาสตร์ขั้นสูง และจัดส่งในบรรจุภัณฑ์ที่สะดวก

sciencePack4Factory_desc.english: This factory produces tools and reagents needed for ultra-advanced scientific research, and delivers them in a convenient package.
sciencePack4Factory_desc.italian: Questa fabbrica produce strumenti e reagenti necessari per la ricerca scientifica ultra-avanzata e li consegna in un pratico pacchetto.
sciencePack4Factory_desc.thai: โรงงานแห่งนี้ผลิตเครื่องมือและสารที่ใช้เป็นตัวกระทำปฏิกิริยาที่จำเป็นสำหรับการวิจัยทางวิทยาศาสตร์ขั้นสูงสุด และจัดส่งในบรรจุภัณฑ์ที่สะดวก

researchLab_desc.english:
We love science! In the research laboratory, new technologies are developed.
To select a research, click on the microscope icon at the top left of the screen.
researchLab_desc.italian:
Amiamo la scienza! Nel laboratorio di ricerca si sviluppano nuove tecnologie.
Per selezionare una ricerca, clicca sull'icona del microscopio in alto a sinistra dello schermo.

storehouseSmall_desc.english:
Concrete, steel and adamantium can be stored here, without limit! These materials will be reserved for building construction.
Storehouses never export stored materials. If you want to direct cement, steel or adamantium to some specific industries, remember to connect them directly to the factories that produce these materials, using districts or distribution centers.
storehouseSmall_desc.italian:
Qui si possono stoccare cemento, acciaio e adamantio, senza limiti! Questi materiali saranno riservati alla costruzione degli edifici.
I magazzini non esportano mai i materiali stoccati. Se vuoi indirizzare cemento, acciaio o adamantio verso alcune industrie specifiche, ricordati di connetterle direttamente alle fabbriche che producono questi materiali, utilizzando i distretti o i centri di distribuzione.

storehouse_desc.english:
Concrete, steel and adamantium can be stored here, without limit! These materials will be reserved for building construction.
Storehouses never export stored materials. If you want to direct cement, steel or adamantium to some specific industries, remember to connect them directly to the factories that produce these materials, using districts or distribution centers.
storehouse_desc.italian:
Qui si possono stoccare cemento, acciaio e adamantio, senza limiti! Questi materiali saranno riservati alla costruzione degli edifici.
I magazzini non esportano mai i materiali stoccati. Se vuoi indirizzare cemento, acciaio o adamantio verso alcune industrie specifiche, ricordati di connetterle direttamente alle fabbriche che producono questi materiali, utilizzando i distretti o i centri di distribuzione.

spacePort_desc.english:
A welcome to the newcomers! The Spaceport allows the arrival of migrants.
The number of spaceports does not affect the speed, frequency, or amount of people arriving.
spacePort_desc.italian:
Un benvenuto ai nuovi arrivati! Lo spazioporto consente l'arrivo di migranti.
Il numero di spazioporti non influisce sulla velocità, sulla frequenza o sulla quantità di persone in arrivo.

spaceShipConstructionFacility_desc.english:
Gathers and dispatches resources needed to repair the spaceship Antares.
To select an Antares repair, click on the spaceship icon at the top left of the screen.
spaceShipConstructionFacility_desc.italian:
Raccoglie e invia le risorse necessarie per riparare l'astronave Antares.
Per selezionare una riparazione di Antares, clicca sull'icona dell'astronave in alto a sinistra dello schermo.

recyclingCenter_desc.english: Recycling is important! This building enables resource-free production once in every five production cycles. It applies to industries in the surrounding area that support this improvement.
recyclingCenter_desc.italian: Riciclare è importante! Questo edificio consente una produzione senza consumare risorse una volta ogni cinque cicli produttivi. Si applica alle industrie dell'area circostante che supportano questo miglioramento.

soilEnrichmentFacility_desc.english: Soil quality makes a difference. This building increases production speed by 50%. It applies to farms in the surrounding area.
soilEnrichmentFacility_desc.italian: La qualità del terreno fa la differenza. Questo edificio aumenta la velocità di produzione del 50%. Si applica alle fattorie nell'area circostante.

airProcessor_desc.english: Extracts oxygen and carbon from the atmosphere.

oxygenProcessor_desc.english: Extracts a good amount of oxygen from the atmosphere.
oxygenProcessor_desc.italian: Estrae una buona quantità di ossigeno dall'atmosfera.

carbonProcessor_desc.english: Extracts a good amount of carbon from the atmosphere.
carbonProcessor_desc.italian: Estrae una buona quantità di carbonio dall'atmosfera.

waterWellHydraulic_desc.english: Extracts a considerable amount of water from underground.
waterWellHydraulic_desc.italian: Estrae una considerevole quantità di acqua dal sottosuolo.

methaneFermentationPlant_desc.english: Produces a good amount of methane from organic waste.
methaneFermentationPlant_desc.italian: Produce una buona quantità di metano a partire dai rifiuti organici.

basicFarm_desc.english:
Provides the essential food to stay healthy.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 2.
basicFarm_desc.italian:
Fornisce il cibo l'essenziale per mantenersi in salute.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 2.

fertilizerFactory_desc.english: Produces fertilizer, mainly used for cultivation.

vegetableFarm_desc.english: Cultivation of all kinds of edible vegetables.
vegetableFarm_desc.italian: Coltivazioni di ogni genere di verdura commestibile

meatLab_desc.italian: Coltivazione intensiva di carne. Strettamente sintetica!

foodFactory_desc.english:
Ready-made dishes right on your tables!

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 5.
foodFactory_desc.italian:
Piatti pronti direttamente sulle vostre tavole!

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 5.

habitatLevel1_desc.english: Home sweet home! People will live here. The building will improve as demands are met, welcoming more and more residents.
habitatLevel1_desc.italian: Casa dolce casa! Le persone vivranno qui. L'edificio migliorerà man mano che le esigenze saranno soddisfatte, accogliendo sempre più residenti.

oxygenTank_desc.english:
Extra oxygen supply.
Tanks are used to store a good amount of gas or liquid, so as not to run out of resources immediately in case of a drop in production. It can only connect to the piping system and doesn’t require road connection.
oxygenTank_desc.italian:
Fornitura extra di ossigeno.
I serbatoi vengono utilizzati per immagazzinare una buona quantità di gas o liquidi, in modo da evitare di esaurire immediatamente le risorse in caso di diminuzione della produzione. Possono essere collegati solo al sistema di tubature e non richiedono una connessione stradale.

waterTank_desc.english:
Extra water supply.
Tanks are used to store a good amount of gas or liquid, so as not to run out of resources immediately in case of a drop in production. It can only connect to the piping system and doesn’t require road connection.
waterTank_desc.italian:
Fornitura extra di acqua.
I serbatoi vengono utilizzati per immagazzinare una buona quantità di gas o liquidi, in modo da evitare di esaurire immediatamente le risorse in caso di diminuzione della produzione. Possono essere collegati solo al sistema di tubature e non richiedono una connessione stradale.

methaneTank_desc.english:
Extra methane supply.
Tanks are used to store a good amount of gas or liquid, so as not to run out of resources immediately in case of a drop in production. It can only connect to the piping system and doesn’t require road connection.
methaneTank_desc.italian:
Fornitura extra di metano.
I serbatoi vengono utilizzati per immagazzinare una buona quantità di gas o liquidi, in modo da evitare di esaurire immediatamente le risorse in caso di diminuzione della produzione. Possono essere collegati solo al sistema di tubature e non richiedono una connessione stradale.

crudeOilTank_desc.english:
Extra crude oil supply.
Tanks are used to store a good amount of gas or liquid, so as not to run out of resources immediately in case of a drop in production. It can only connect to the piping system and doesn’t require road connection.
crudeOilTank_desc.italian:
Fornitura extra di petrolio.
I serbatoi vengono utilizzati per immagazzinare una buona quantità di gas o liquidi, in modo da evitare di esaurire immediatamente le risorse in caso di diminuzione della produzione. Possono essere collegati solo al sistema di tubature e non richiedono una connessione stradale.

methanePowerPlant_desc.english: Produces a considerable amount of electricity by burning methane.
methanePowerPlant_desc.italian: Produce una considerevole quantità di elettricità bruciando metano.

powerSubstation_desc.english: Supplies power to a large surrounding area. It must be connected to a power source.
powerSubstation_desc.italian: Fornisce energia a un'ampia area circostante. Deve essere collegato a una fonte di alimentazione.

windTurbine_desc.english: Harness wind to produce a modest amount of energy. For optimal efficiency, do not overlap their areas of action!
windTurbine_desc.italian: Sfrutta il vento per produrre una modesta quantità di energia. Per un'efficienza ottimale, non sovrapporre le loro aree di azione!

solarPowerPlant_desc.english: Harness solar energy to produce a fair amount of energy.
solarPowerPlant_desc.italian: Sfrutta l'energia solare per produrre una buona quantità di energia.

solarPowerPlant_Variation_desc.english: Harness solar energy to produce a fair amount of energy.
solarPowerPlant_Variation_desc.italian: Sfrutta l'energia solare per produrre una buona quantità di energia.

nuclearPowerPlant_desc.english: Produces a large amount of electricity by harnessing the nuclear fission of uranium.
nuclearPowerPlant_desc.italian: Produce una grande quantità di elettricità sfruttando la fissione nucleare dell'uranio.

fastNeutronReactor_desc.english: Produces a huge amount of electricity using the latest uranium nuclear fission technology.
fastNeutronReactor_desc.italian: Produce una enorme quantità di energia utilizzando la più recente tecnologia di fissione nucleare dell'uranio.

trainstation_1R_desc.english:
Goods traveling by freight train are loaded and unloaded here. This station is equipped with one one-way track.

To manage the trains, click on the train icon on the left side of the screen.
trainstation_1R_desc.italian:
Qui vengono caricate e scaricate le merci che viaggiano sui treni. Questa stazione è dotata di un binaro unidirezionale.

Per gestire i treni, clicca sull'icona del treno sul lato sinistro dello schermo.

trainstation_2R_desc.english:
Goods traveling by freight train are loaded and unloaded here. This station is equipped with two one-way tracks, one for each direction.

To manage the trains, click on the train icon on the left side of the screen.
trainstation_2R_desc.italian:
Qui vengono caricate e scaricate le merci che viaggiano sui treni. Questa stazione è dotata di due binari unidirezionali, uno per ciascuna direzione.

Per gestire i treni, clicca sull'icona del treno sul lato sinistro dello schermo.

trainstation_4R_desc.english:
Goods traveling by freight train are loaded and unloaded here. This station is equipped with four one-way tracks, two for each direction.

To manage the trains, click on the train icon on the left side of the screen.
trainstation_4R_desc.italian:
Qui vengono caricate e scaricate le merci che viaggiano sui treni. Questa stazione è dotata di quattro binari unidirezionali, due per ciascuna direzione.

Per gestire i treni, clicca sull'icona del treno sul lato sinistro dello schermo.

trainstation_6R_desc.english:
Goods traveling by freight train are loaded and unloaded here. This station is equipped with six one-way tracks, two for each direction.

To manage the trains, click on the train icon on the left side of the screen.
trainstation_6R_desc.italian:
Qui vengono caricate e scaricate le merci che viaggiano sui treni. Questa stazione è dotata di sei binari unidirezionali, tre per ciascuna direzione.

Per gestire i treni, clicca sull'icona del treno sul lato sinistro dello schermo.

trainstation_8R_desc.english:
Goods traveling by freight train are loaded and unloaded here. This station is equipped with eight one-way tracks, four for each direction.

To manage the trains, click on the train icon on the left side of the screen.
trainstation_8R_desc.italian:
Qui vengono caricate e scaricate le merci che viaggiano sui treni. Questa stazione è dotata di otto binari unidirezionali, quattro per ciascuna direzione.

Per gestire i treni, clicca sull'icona del treno sul lato sinistro dello schermo.

gondolaStation_desc.english: Use the cargo gondola to transport resources up and down slopes. The two stations must be placed in front of each other.
gondolaStation_desc.italian: Utilizza la cabinovia per trasportare le risorse lungo i pendii. Le due stazioni devono essere posizionate una di fronte all'altra.

targetingStation_desc.english: The Antares' cannon allows for the permanent removal of unwanted plants and rocks. Disintegrate them with a laser! Requires the repair of the Laser Cannon of the Antares spaceship.
targetingStation_desc.italian: Il cannone di Antares consente di rimuovere in modo permanente piante e rocce indesiderate. Disintegratele con un laser! Richiede la riparazione del cannone laser della nave spaziale Antares.

filteringMeshFactory_desc.english: Produces a material capable of retaining much of the harmful particles in the air.
filteringMeshFactory_desc.italian: Produce un materiale in grado di trattenere gran parte delle particelle nocive presenti nell'aria.

advancedFilteringMeshFactory_desc.english: Produces a material that can contain the totality of harmful particles in the air.
advancedFilteringMeshFactory_desc.italian: Produce un materiale in grado di contenere la totalità delle particelle nocive presenti nell'aria.

superconductingCoilFactory_desc.italian: Produce un superconduttore ad alte prestazioni.

dustParticleFilter_desc.english:
The air seems less heavy around here. It purifies the air of fine dust within a moderately-sized area of action.

To terraform a portion of land, you need four different terraforming buildings operating on that area.
dustParticleFilter_desc.italian:
L'aria sembra meno pesante da queste parti. Purifica l'aria dalle polveri sottili entro un'area di azione di dimensioni moderate.

Per terraformare una porzione di terreno, sono necessari quattro diversi edifici di terraformazione che operano su quell'area.

fertilizerDroneHub_desc.english:
Here, once upon a time, everything was deserted! The drone prepares the ground for vegetation growth, within a considerably large area of action.

To terraform a portion of land, you need four different terraforming buildings operating on that area.
fertilizerDroneHub_desc.italian:
Qui, un tempo, tutto era deserto! Il drone prepara il terreno per la crescita della vegetazione, in un'area d'azione considerevolmente ampia.

Per terraformare una porzione di terreno, sono necessari quattro diversi edifici di terraformazione che operano su quell'area.

groundAcidityRegulator_desc.english:
Vegetation also needs proper nourishment. Regulates soil PH, preparing it for terraforming, within a significantly expansive area of action.

To terraform a portion of land, you need four different terraforming buildings operating on that area.
groundAcidityRegulator_desc.italian:
Anche la vegetazione ha bisogno di un nutrimento adeguato. Regola il PH del suolo, preparandolo per la terraformazione, in un'area d'azione notevolmente estesa.

Per terraformare una porzione di terreno, sono necessari quattro diversi edifici di terraformazione che operano su quell'area.

ammoniaExtractor_desc.english:
The air has never been so pure! It extracts excess ammonia from the air, making it suitable for the proliferation of life. It has an enormously vast area of action.

To terraform a portion of land, you need four different terraforming buildings operating on that area.
ammoniaExtractor_desc.italian:
L'aria non è mai stata così pura! Estrae l'ammoniaca in eccesso dall'aria, rendendola adatta alla proliferazione della vita. Ha un'area d'azione enormemente vasta.

Per terraformare una porzione di terreno, sono necessari quattro diversi edifici di terraformazione che operano su quell'area.

magneticFieldGenerator_Stage0_desc.english:
Technology has made great strides. Generate a magnetic field to protect Neper-3 from radiation and stellar wind.
This colossal building will need several resources for its construction to be completed. The radius covers all the map area.

To terraform a portion of land, you need four different terraforming buildings operating on that area.
magneticFieldGenerator_Stage0_desc.italian:
La tecnologia ha fatto passi da gigante. Genera un campo magnetico per proteggere Neper-3 dalle radiazioni e dal vento stellare.
Questo edificio colossale avrà bisogno di diverse risorse per la sua costruzione. Il raggio copre l'intera area della mappa.

Per terraformare una porzione di terreno, sono necessari quattro diversi edifici di terraformazione che operano su quell'area.

pixelBuildingCorner_desc.english: Give free rein to your imagination! A colorful building to compose images from above.
pixelBuildingCorner_desc.italian: Dai libero sfogo alla tua fantasia! Un edificio colorato per comporre immagini dall'alto.

pixelBuildingInvertCorner_desc.english: Give free rein to your imagination! A colorful building to compose images from above.
pixelBuildingInvertCorner_desc.italian: Dai libero sfogo alla tua fantasia! Un edificio colorato per comporre immagini dall'alto.

pixelBuildingRound_desc.english: Give free rein to your imagination! A colorful building to compose images from above.
pixelBuildingRound_desc.italian: Dai libero sfogo alla tua fantasia! Un edificio colorato per comporre immagini dall'alto.

pixelBuildingRoundCorner_desc.english: Give free rein to your imagination! A colorful building to compose images from above.
pixelBuildingRoundCorner_desc.italian: Dai libero sfogo alla tua fantasia! Un edificio colorato per comporre immagini dall'alto.

pixelBuildingSquare_desc.english: Give free rein to your imagination! A colorful building to compose images from above.
pixelBuildingSquare_desc.italian: Dai libero sfogo alla tua fantasia! Un edificio colorato per comporre immagini dall'alto.

park_desc.english:
A place to take a break from the city chaos.

Public buildings distribute resources to the surrounding habitats.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 4.
park_desc.italian:
Un luogo dove prendersi una pausa dal caos cittadino.

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 4.

arena_desc.english:
The gathering and entertainment place for young and old!

Public buildings distribute resources to the surrounding habitats.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 5.
arena_desc.italian:
Il luogo di ritrovo per grandi e piccini!

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 5.

theater_desc.english:
The gathering and entertainment place for young and old!

Public buildings distribute resources to the surrounding habitats.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 5.
theater_desc.italian:
Il luogo di ritrovo per grandi e piccini!

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

holoCinema_desc.italian:

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 5.

kindergarten_desc.english:
It keeps the level of education high.

Public buildings distribute resources to the surrounding habitats.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 6.
kindergarten_desc.italian:
Mantiene alto il livello di educazione.

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 6.

school_desc.english:
It keeps the level of education high.

Public buildings distribute resources to the surrounding habitats.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 6.
school_desc.italian:
Mantiene alto il livello di educazione.

Gli edifici pubblici distribuiscono le risorse agli habitat circostanti.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 6.

sportCenter_desc.english:
Working out can be fun! So they say.

Resource needed to improve habitats at level 5.
sportCenter_desc.italian:
Allenarsi è divertente! Così dicono.

Risorsa necessaria per migliorare gli habitat al livello 5.

panoramicWheel_desc.english: Citizens want to see the city from above, too!
panoramicWheel_desc.italian: Anche i cittadini vogliono vedere la città dall'alto!'

parkingLot1_desc.english: Parking lots can also have an attractive design. Tip: put it next to a straight road, in gridless mode.
parkingLot1_desc.italian: Anche i parcheggi possono avere un design accattivante. Suggerimento: accostalo a una strada diritta, in modalità senza griglia.

stemCellLab_desc.english: Synthesizes stem cells, used for meat cultivation.
stemCellLab_desc.italian: Sintetizza cellule staminali, usate per la coltivazione della carne.

chemicalsLab_desc.english: Derives basic chemicals from some characteristic alien plants. This building should be placed on red grass meadows.
chemicalsLab_desc.italian: Ricava le sostanze chimiche di base da alcune caratteristiche piante aliene. Questo edificio deve essere collocato sui prati di erba rossa.

industrialChemicalsLab_desc.english: Synthesizes a wide variety of chemicals for industrial use.
industrialChemicalsLab_desc.italian: Sintetizza un'ampia varietà di prodotti chimici per uso industriale.

plasticFactory_desc.english: Produces plastics, used by industries for a variety of applications.
plasticFactory_desc.italian: Produce plastica, usata nelle industrie per diverse applicazioni.

sensorFactory_desc.english: Produces sensors, important electronic devices used widely in high-tech industries.
sensorFactory_desc.italian: Produce sensori, importanti dispositivi elettronici ampiamente utilizzati nelle industrie high-tech.

copperMill_desc.english: Processes and refines copper to extract the pure metal.
copperMill_desc.italian: Processa il rame grezzo per estrarne il metallo puro.

enrichedUraniumFactory_desc.english: Processes uranium to prepare it for energy exploitation.
enrichedUraniumFactory_desc.italian: Trasforma l'uranio per prepararlo allo sfruttamento energetico.

heatExchangerFactory_desc.english: Produces heat exchangers, used for temperature control in large industries.
heatExchangerFactory_desc.italian: Produce scambiatori di calore, utilizzati per il controllo della temperatura nelle grandi industrie.

waterDistillery_desc.english: Removes all water impurities through the distillation process.
waterDistillery_desc.italian: Rimuove tutte le impurità dell'acqua attraverso il processo di distillazione.

pyramid_desc.italian: Il passato che incontra il futuro.

ffEasterEgg_desc.italian: Questa strana scultura ha un aspetto famigliare…

distributionCenter_desc.english:
Keep your production chains running smoothly! This building receives the desired resources from a collection center connected to it, and distributes them to surrounding industries.
It does not receive resources directly to the industries.
distributionCenter_desc.italian:
Mantieni le tue catene di produzione senza intoppi! Questo edificio riceve le risorse desiderate da un centro di raccolta ad esso collegato, e le distribuisce alle industrie circostanti.
Non riceve le risorse direttamente alle industrie.

collectionCenter_desc.english:
Keep your production chains running smoothly! This building collects the desired resources from surrounding industries, and then sends them directly to a distribution center connected to it.
Does not deliver resources directly to industries.
collectionCenter_desc.italian:
Mantieni le tue catene di produzione senza intoppi! Questo edificio raccoglie le risorse desiderate dalle industrie circostanti, e le invia direttamente a un centro di distribuzione ad esso collegato.
Non consegna le risorse direttamente alle industrie.
